title: Polkadex Orderbook
description: Polkadex is a fully non-custodial platform, so the assets in your wallet are always under your control.

features.stepOneDescription: Sign up on Orderbook. Rest assured, we prioritize your security and use any data solely for security and marketing.
features.stepTwoDescription: Choose your wallet from a variety of Polkadot-based wallets, and register it for use within Orderbook.
features.stepThreeDescription: Transfer funds into your trading account. Now, you‘re all set to start trading.
features.ctaTitle: Click this small button to begin trading

benefits.oneDescription: Trade crypto with sub-milisecond latency on a DEX that’s as fast as CEXs.
benefits.twoDescription: Sign up on Orderbook. Rest assured, we prioritize your security and use any data solely for security and marketing.
benefits.threeDescription: Control price with limit orders, achieve instant execution with market orders.
benefits.fourDescription: You control your own liquidity, which means it is safe, and you can pull it out whenever.

help.faqDescription: Explore our Frequently Asked Questions section for in-depth guidance on specific features.
help.socialDescription: Polkadex Community connects users from 100+ countries and supporting 5+ languages.
